metadata.title: CVE-2021-23566 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The package nanoid from 3.0.0 and before 3.1.31 are vulnerable toInformation Exposure via the valueOf() function which allows to reproducethe last id generated.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
node-mocha: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
